name: get-accounting
description: Retrieves accounting activity during the queried timespan.

fromDate.description: Orders invoice date. Date-time in ISO 8601 format for selecting orders after, or at, the specified time

toDate.description: Orders invoice date. Date-time in ISO 8601 format for selecting orders before, or at, the specified time

page.description: A multiplier of the number of items (limit parameter) to skip before returning results

limit.description: The numbers of items to return

warehouseIds.description: A CSV of warehouse id, '123' or '1,2,3'

orderIds.description: A CSV of FDC order id, '123' or '1,2,3'

hydrate.description: Adds additional information to the response, uses a CSV format for multiple values.

$ul: **count**: Count of records returned in response, this will be equal to or less then the limit parameter
**currentPage**: Current page of the response, this will match the page parameter
**total**: Total number of records available to request
**totalPages**: Total number of pages available to request
